name: FREE MINI RETREAT
description: Take some sacred time for yourself and restore peace with my virtual retreat.

name: LIGHTER MEMBERSHIP
description: Explore the spacious, otherworldly practice of restorative yoga - in community.

name: THE FREE PODCAST
description: Get loving guidance and tools for less stress, more flow and fulfilling your purpose.

name: SEXY PILATES ABS
description: If you notice you need a little pick me up throughout the day, try reaching for protein snacks. You will definitely notice a boost in energy and a reduced need for unhealthy snacking. What is your favorite protein-sourced snack?

name: MAGIC CIRCLE
description: I love to journal in the morning and evening. After a particularly stressful day, I find it so helpful to get my thoughts down on paper in the evenings to let go of the day’s stressors so that I can sleep peacefully.

name: YOGA TONE
description: I’m an avid yogi – I use yoga for a variety of reasons – from calming and centering myself to energizing myself for the day ahead.
